alert.note: Alert for Coconino; Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 3:50PM MST until July 22 at 4:30PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Coconino County in north central Arizona... Yavapai County in west central Arizona... * Until 430 PM MST. * At 350 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Seligman, or 44 miles northwest of Chino Valley, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Seligman. This includes the following highways... Business Interstate 40 between mile markers 140 and 141. Route 66 between mile markers 131 and 139. Interstate 40 between mile markers 110 and 131. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
